title: Spicy Peanut Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Spicy Peanut Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close

Prep
5 mins

5 mins
Serves
8 servings
Makes
1 cup
Cook Mode

Ingredients
1/2
cup
chunky peanut butter
1
tablespoon
soy sauce
1
tablespoon
sambal oelek
fresh crushed chile paste
1/4
cup sliced
scallions
1
tablespoon
lime juice
1
tablespoon
sugar
1/4
cup
warm
water
Directions
Whisk all ingredients together in a medium bowl. Serve with fried chicken.
